title: Left group punishes MEP over alleged assault on journalist
summary_full: “I raised my hand, but I did not punch him,” Greek MEP Nikos Pappas said, denying allegations of assault
summary_public: “I raised my hand, but I did not punch him,” Greek MEP Nikos Pappas said, denying allegations of assault

GR.label: negative
